comment: She doesn't stand out as an amazing professor, but she is sweet and understanding. She is SUPER disorganized. Most of class is spent with her getting side tracked and rambling about different stories. You will learn some, just not a lot. Kind of a pointless class. It is hard to stay on track because she is all over the place. Easy grader though.

She clearly cares a lot about her students but is disorganized. She doesn't give very clear instructions or grading criteria. It's not hard to get a good grade in here and you will still learn a lot, but this class can be frustrating due to her disorganization.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read
